properties.value: Cows are common low level monsters new players train on. They are one of the first NPCs new players see in Lumbridge. Cows can help new players earn money, Cooking experience, and combat experience. The cowhides that they drop can be tanned to make leather or hard leather, or they can be sold for coins to players wanting to raise their Crafting level. While most locations containing cows are crowded, there are some spots usually vacant, like the spot north of the windmill north-west of Lumbridge. Along with cows, you can also find cow calves and dairy cows.

Cows are common low level monsters new players train on. They are one of the first NPCs new players see in Lumbridge. Cows can help new players earn money, Cooking experience, and combat experience. The cowhides that they drop can be tanned to make leather or hard leather, or they can be sold for coins to players wanting to raise their Crafting level. While most locations containing cows are crowded, there are some spots usually vacant, like the spot north of the windmill north-west of Lumbridge. Along with cows, you can also find cow calves and dairy cows.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 November 2018
(update)

Cowhides will now appear at the top of the drop pile when killing cows.

11 July 2005
(update)

The NPCs examines were changed from "It's a dairy cow."

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Click here for a list of other transcripts that this NPC speaks in.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Cows, while generally weak, are immune to poison and venom. This is reportedly due to a conflict with their 'Moo' timing interrupting poison and venom's timers.
  • Using an item on a cow prompts the message "The cow doesn't want that." as opposed to the usual "Nothing interesting happens."
  • The Zanaris cow variant had a festive override wearing a santa hat and clown nose during the 2016 Christmas event.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Cow (Nightmare Zone), the cow with a rare chance to appear inside Nightmare Zone.

This is reportedly due to a conflict with their 'Moo' timing interrupting poison and venom's timers. *Using an item on a cow prompts the message "The cow doesn't want that." as opposed to the usual "Nothing interesting happens." * The Zanaris cow variant had a festive override wearing a [[santa hat]] and clown nose during the [[2016 Christmas event/Gallery|2016]] Christmas event. ==See also== *[[Cow (Nightmare Zone)]], the cow with a rare chance to appear inside [[Nightmare Zone]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Falador farm}}
